longdescr: First and second couples leading down in Anna Holden's Strathspey at the 2013 Halloween dance on 26 Oct. 2013.
Darrick and Geoffrey show off their costumes at the annual Bellingham Masquerade Ball on 26 Oct. 2013.
Caitlin and Don roast marshmellows at the summer picnic in Tualatin, Oregon on 18 August 2013.
The kilted mile runners dance a reel of five during the race!
Sandy MacKenzie marches in full drum major regalia with Clan MacKenzie at the clan march at noon on 20 July 2013.
The Baxter family retires from Scottish dancing after several decades of rolling up the rug.
A line of ladies perform the setting step from ‘Miss Milligan’s Strathspey’ at the dance in downtown Vancouver, Washington on 4 May 2013.
Young dancers take time out from the ball to pose for a goofy photo.
A line of men take hands to dance a setting step in the strathspey ‘Adieu Mon Ami’ at the ball in Lake Oswego, Oregon on 9 March 2013.
From the dance ‘Tribute to the Borders’, this is an allemande being danced at the TAC summer school ball at Portland State University on 4 August 2012.
Circling six hands around and back as part of ‘Lady Lucy Ramsay’, at the ball held at Norse Hall on 10 March 2012.
Left hands across on the upper field at the Portland Highland Games on 16 July 2011.
Victoria and Sandy MacKenzie pose in formal dress prior to the Portland Ball on 12 March 2011.
Possibly the conclusion of ‘Shiftin Bobbins’, a 32-bar reel for three couples in a four couple set, at the Masonic Friendship Lodge on 1 March 2008.
Darrick, Chandi, Mel, Linda, and Maurice dance a pousette from ‘Bonnie Anne’ at the Portland Rose Festival in June 2007.
Lining up for ‘Roaring Jelly’, the first dance of the evening at the ball held at the Masonic Friendship Center.
Dancers slide into the allemande figure of ‘Gloria's Wee Jig’ at the ball.
